attacks.name: Ultimate Blade
attacks.effect: If the damage from this attack reduces your opponent's Active Pokémon's HP to 60 or less, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Pike
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
